title: Waiting... On You
description: WAITING... ON YOU is a contemporary romance novel set in a small coastal community along the Puget Sound. Hanna Wallace is a shy, but brilliant trauma surgeon who heads up the ER. She is also a woman who has waited years for the man she loves. Hanna and Nick Kelly grew up next door to one another. But at eighteen, Nick left home to become a Force Recon Marine and follow in his heroic father's footsteps. While they have stayed in touch with one another for the past twenty years, they have seen little of each other. They've never had the time to build upon their friendship, and Hanna longs for Nick to see her as more than his best friend.When Hanna's brother is mudered and Nick's brother goes missing, their closely-knit family is devastated. Nick comes home from his deployment in Afghanistan to help find his brother. The two work together to unravel a dangerous threat to their families and community. They have time, at last, but will it be enough to work out the things that have kept them apart? Can their friendship grow into something more, or is it time to give up waiting?
author: S.A. Monk
